response.message: Nice post Jeff. I liked Business Cards idea very much. Can anyone have such a card, of his account on SO, for personal use or is it just for developers/moderators of SE sites?
Great! On the TeX site we already made progress, a talk for the international TeX User Group conference 2011 has been prepared and accepted.

How much of the above is available for beta sites? Clearly, the only graphics we have are the "Sketchy" ones, but we have an even greater need to get our name out there than the more established launched sites.

@harry we can indeed produce business cards for public sites if there is an event opportunity, otherwise they are for community moderators.

@isaac we definitely do flyers for beta sites, and I have updated the post to reflect that. We are also open to sponsoring events for beta sites, but we can't offer business cards, t-shirts, or stickers other than the regular Stack Exchange ones that you'd find at http://store.stackexchange.com

"@harry we can indeed produce business cards for public sites if there is an event opportunity, otherwise they are for community moderators."

Which kind of event?
